name: TestWindowPushDownPlans
cases: set @@tidb_enforce_mpp=1
explain format = 'brief' select *, row_number() over () FROM employee -- 1. empty partition
explain format = 'brief' select *, row_number() over (order by salary) FROM employee -- 1.1 empty partition with sort
explain format = 'brief' select *, row_number() over (partition by deptid) FROM employee -- 2. column partition key
explain format = 'brief' select *, row_number() over (partition by deptid+1) FROM employee -- 3. expression partition key
explain format = 'brief' select *, row_number() over (partition by deptid ORDER BY salary desc) FROM employee -- 3.1 with sort key
explain format = 'brief' select *, rank() over w, dense_rank() over w from employee window w as (partition by deptid) -- 4. same kinds, multi function, same window
explain format = 'brief' select *, row_number() over w, rank() over w from employee window w as (partition by deptid) -- 5. different kinds, multi functions, same window
explain format = 'brief' select *, rank() over () FROM  (select *, row_number() over () a from employee) tmp -- 6. multi window from sub query
explain format = 'brief' select *, rank() over (partition by deptid) FROM  (select *, row_number() over () a from employee) tmp -- 6.1 multi window from sub query
explain format = 'brief' select deptid, row_number() OVER() from (select deptid from employee group by deptid) t;

name: TestWindowFunctionDescCanPushDown
cases: set @@tidb_enforce_mpp=1
explain format = 'brief' select *, row_number() over () FROM employee -- 1. pure window functions
explain format = 'brief' select *, rank() over () FROM employee
explain format = 'brief' select *, dense_rank() over () FROM employee
explain format = 'brief' select *, lead(empid) over () FROM employee
explain format = 'brief' select *, lag(empid) over () FROM employee
explain format = 'brief' select *, row_number() over (partition by empid order by salary RANGE between 1 preceding and 1 following) FROM employee -- 3. range frame

name: TestWindowPlanWithOtherOperators
cases: set @@tidb_enforce_mpp=1
explain select *, row_number() over () from (select count(distinct empid) from employee) t
explain select *, row_number() over () from (select count(empid) from employee group by deptid) t
explain select *, row_number() over (partition by a) from (select count(distinct empid) a from employee) t
explain select *, row_number() over (partition by deptid) from (select count(empid), deptid from employee group by deptid) t
explain select count(distinct empid) from (select *, row_number() over () from employee) t
explain select count(distinct empid) from (select *, row_number() over (partition by deptid) from employee) t
explain select count(empid) from (select *, row_number() over () a from employee) t group by a
explain select count(empid) from (select *, row_number() over (partition by deptid) a from employee) t group by a
explain select row_number() over w2, row_number() over w1 from employee window w2 as (order by deptid), w1 as (partition by deptid);
